workflow.name: Convert LinkedIn videos to MP4 with RapidAPI and store in Google Drive & sheets
workflow.description:
### üöÄ LinkedIn Video to MP4 Automation with Google Drive & Sheets | RapidAPI Integration

This **n8n workflow** automatically converts LinkedIn video URLs into downloadable MP4 files using the [**LinkedIn Video Downloader API**](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3), uploads them to Google Drive with public access, and logs both the original URL and Google Drive link into Google Sheets.  
It leverages the **[LinkedIn Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3)** service for fast and secure video extraction.

---

## üìù **Node Explanations (Single-Line)**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **On form submission** ‚Üí Captures LinkedIn video URL from the user via a web form.  
2Ô∏è‚É£ **HTTP Request** ‚Üí Calls **[LinkedIn Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3)** to fetch downloadable MP4 links.  
3Ô∏è‚É£ **If** ‚Üí Checks for API errors and routes workflow accordingly.  
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Download mp4** ‚Üí Downloads the MP4 video file from the API response URL.  
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Upload To Google Drive** ‚Üí Uploads the downloaded MP4 file to Google Drive.  
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Drive Set Permission** ‚Üí Makes the uploaded file publicly accessible.  
7Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Sheets** ‚Üí Logs successful conversions with LinkedIn URL and sharable Drive link.  
8Ô∏è‚É£ **Wait** ‚Üí Delays execution before logging failed attempts.  
9Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Sheets Append Row** ‚Üí Logs failed video downloads with `N/A` Drive link.  

---
## üìÑ **Google Sheets Columns**

- **URL** ‚Üí Original LinkedIn video URL entered in the form.  
- **Drive_URL** ‚Üí Publicly sharable Google Drive link to the converted MP4 file.  
- *(For failed downloads)* ‚Üí **Drive_URL** will display `N/A`.

---

## üí° **Use Case**

- Automate LinkedIn video downloading and sharing using **[LinkedIn Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/linkedin-video-downloader3)** for **social media managers, marketers, and content creators** without manual file handling.

---

## ‚úÖ **Benefits**

- **Time-saving** (auto-download & upload), **Centralized tracking** in Sheets, **Easy sharing** via Drive links, and **Error logging** for failed downloads‚Äîall powered by **RapidAPI LinkedIn Video Downloader**.

parameters.content:
## üü¢ **1. On form submission**
- **Purpose:** Acts as the trigger for the workflow.  
- **Functionality:** Displays a form with a single field (`URL`) where users can enter the LinkedIn video link.  
- **Output:** Passes the entered URL to the next node for processing.

## üåê **2. HTTP Request**
- **Purpose:** Fetch downloadable MP4 link.  
- **Functionality:** Sends a `POST` request to **RapidAPI LinkedIn Video Downloader API**, passing the URL from the form.  
- **Output:** Receives a JSON response containing downloadable media links.

## üîç **3. If**
- **Purpose:** Check for API errors.  
- **Functionality:** Evaluates if the response contains an `error` field.  
- **Output:** 
  - ‚úÖ **True Path:** Proceeds to download the MP4.  
  - ‚ùå **False Path:** Goes to error handling (Wait + Sheets logging).

## ‚¨áÔ∏è **4. Download mp4**
- **Purpose:** Download the video file.  
- **Functionality:** Uses the media URL from the previous API response to download the MP4 video.  
- **Output:** Stores the raw MP4 binary for upload.

-

## ‚òÅÔ∏è **5. Upload To Google Drive**
- **Purpose:** Store video in Google Drive.  
- **Functionality:** Uploads the downloaded MP4 into the specified Drive folder.  
- **Output:** Returns a file ID for the uploaded file.

## üîë **6. Google Drive Set Permission**
- **Purpose:** Make the file publicly accessible.  
- **Functionality:** Sets file permissions to `Anyone with the link can view`.  
- **Output:** Provides a sharable `webViewLink`.

## ‚è±Ô∏è **8. Wait**
- **Purpose:** Delay before logging failures.  
- **Functionality:** Pauses workflow execution to avoid instant sheet logging when API errors occur.  
- **Output:** Prevents rapid consecutive writes to Google Sheets.

## üìë **9. Google Sheets Append Row**
- **Purpose:** Log failed conversions.  
- **Functionality:** Appends a row with:
  - `URL` ‚Üí Original LinkedIn link  
  - `Drive_URL` ‚Üí `N/A` (indicating download failure)  
- **Output:** Tracks failed attempts separately.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
